item.title: Wimbledon 2015: days 10, 11 and 12
item.trailText: Guardian photographer Tom Jenkins brings you his best images from days 10, 11 and 12 in SW19
item.standFirst: Guardian photographer Tom Jenkins brings you his best images from days 10, 11 and 12 in SW19

displayImages.caption: Maria Sharapova lets fly a serve in her semi-final against Serena Williams
displayImages.altText: Maria Sharapova lets fly a serve in her Ladies Singles Semi Final against Serena Williams
displayImages.cleanCaption: Maria Sharapova lets fly a serve in her semi-final against Serena Williams

displayImages.caption: Williams is not intimidated
displayImages.altText: Williams is not intimidated
displayImages.cleanCaption: Williams is not intimidated

displayImages.caption: Williams waves to the royal box as she walks off after her victory over Sharapova
displayImages.altText: Serena Williams waves to the Royal Box as she walks off after her victory over Maria Sharapova
displayImages.cleanCaption: Williams waves to the royal box as she walks off after her victory over Sharapova

displayImages.caption: Garbiñe Muguruza returns against Agnieszka Radwanska in the other semi-final
displayImages.altText: Garbine Muguruza returns against Agnieszka Radwanska in her Ladies Singles Semi Final
displayImages.cleanCaption: Garbiñe Muguruza returns against Agnieszka Radwanska in the other semi-final

displayImages.caption: Muguruza is literally floored by her semi-final victory
displayImages.altText: Garbine Muguruza is literally floored by her semi-final victory
displayImages.cleanCaption: Muguruza is literally floored by her semi-final victory

displayImages.caption: Patricia and Bjorn Borg sit in the royal box to watch Novak Djokovic and Richard Gasquet in their Men’s semi-final
displayImages.altText: Patricia and Bjorn Borg in the Royal Box to watch Novak Djokovic and Richard Gasquet in their Men’s semi-final
displayImages.cleanCaption: Patricia and Bjorn Borg sit in the royal box to watch Novak Djokovic and Richard Gasquet in their Men’s semi-final

displayImages.altText: Using multiple exposures to show the service technique of Richard Gasquet

displayImages.caption: Djokovic needing hydration in the heat
displayImages.altText: Djokovic needing hydration in the heat
displayImages.cleanCaption: Djokovic needing hydration in the heat

displayImages.caption: As his coach, former champion Boris Becker looks on with concern
displayImages.altText: As Djokovic'a coach, former champion Boris Becker looks on with concern
displayImages.cleanCaption: As his coach, former champion Boris Becker looks on with concern

displayImages.caption: Djokovic pats the centre court grass after his rather inevitable win against a talented Gasquet
displayImages.altText: Novak Djokovic pats the centre court grass after his rather inevitable win against a talented Gasquet
displayImages.cleanCaption: Djokovic pats the centre court grass after his rather inevitable win against a talented Gasquet

displayImages.caption: Spectators on Murray Mount prepare to watch Andy Murray’s semi-final against Roger Federer
displayImages.altText: Spectators on Murray Mount preparing to watch Andy Murray’s semi against Roger Federer
displayImages.cleanCaption: Spectators on Murray Mount prepare to watch Andy Murray’s semi-final against Roger Federer

displayImages.caption: Federer serves with grace against Murray
displayImages.altText: Roger Federer serves with grace during his semi-final match with Andy Murray on Centre Court
displayImages.cleanCaption: Federer serves with grace against Murray

displayImages.caption: Murray struggles to reach a ball
displayImages.altText: Murray struggles to reach a ball
displayImages.cleanCaption: Murray struggles to reach a ball

displayImages.caption: Murray shows his frustration
displayImages.altText: Murray oshows his frustration at his form

displayImages.caption: Federer attacks the net
displayImages.altText: Ever elegant to watch, Roger Federer attacks the net

displayImages.cleanCaption: Federer clenches his fist after winning yet another point

displayImages.caption: Murray looks rueful after yet another defeat by Federer

displayImages.cleanCaption: Murray looks rueful after yet another defeat by Federer

displayImages.caption: A scenic view of Serena Williams’ women’s singles final against Garbiñe Muguruza

displayImages.cleanCaption: A scenic view of Serena Williams’ women’s singles final against Garbiñe Muguruza

displayImages.caption: Muguruza returns to secure a surprise break
displayImages.altText: Muguruza returns to Serena Williams to a surprise break
displayImages.cleanCaption: Muguruza returns to secure a surprise break

displayImages.caption: Williams gets in a tangle
displayImages.altText: Williams finds the early games disrupted by Garbine Muguruza
displayImages.cleanCaption: Williams gets in a tangle

displayImages.caption: Williams is still off balance when she returns to Muguruza

displayImages.caption: But Williams finds her power and form

displayImages.caption: Now it’s Muguruza’s turn to struggle
displayImages.altText:
Wimbledon day twelve
Now it’s Garbine Muguruza’s turn to struggle
displayImages.cleanCaption: Now it’s Muguruza’s turn to struggle

displayImages.caption: Williams jumps joyfully after powering to the title
displayImages.altText: But Serena Williams jumps joyfully as she powers to her victory over Garbine Muguruza
displayImages.cleanCaption: Williams jumps joyfully after powering to the title

displayImages.caption: A gracious Williams embraces Muguruza
displayImages.altText: A gracious Serena Williams embraces Garbine Muguruza
displayImages.cleanCaption: A gracious Williams embraces Muguruza

cards.title: Picture of the day / Brisbane Broncos win through a deluge
cards.rawTitle: Brisbane Broncos win through a deluge

item.title: Sport picture of the day: Brisbane Broncos win through a deluge
item.trailText: Daniel Vidot of the Brisbane Broncos finds it wet during their match with the Canterbury Bulldogs. Photographer Mark Kolbe emphasised the stormy conditions with this dramatic use of black and white
item.standFirst: Daniel Vidot of the Brisbane Broncos finds it wet during their match with the Canterbury Bulldogs. Photographer Mark Kolbe emphasised the stormy conditions with this dramatic use of black and white

displayImages.altText: The Bulldogs’ Sam Perrett tackles the Broncos’ Daniel Vidot, front. This was during the round 18 NRL match. Between the Canterbury Bulldogs and the Brisbane Broncos at ANZ Stadium in Sydney, Australia

headerImage.caption: Canterbury Bulldogs’ Sam Perrett, left, tackles the Brisbane Broncos’ Daniel Vidot during the NRL match at ANZ Stadium in Sydney. Photograph: Mark Kolbe/Getty Images
headerImage.altText: The Bulldogs’ Sam Perrett tackles the Broncos’ Daniel Vidot, front. This was during the round 18 NRL match. Between the Canterbury Bulldogs and the Brisbane Broncos at ANZ Stadium in Sydney, Australia
headerImage.cleanCaption: Canterbury Bulldogs’ Sam Perrett, left, tackles the Brisbane Broncos’ Daniel Vidot during the NRL match at ANZ Stadium in Sydney.

image.altText: The Bulldogs’ Sam Perrett tackles the Broncos’ Daniel Vidot, front. This was during the round 18 NRL match. Between the Canterbury Bulldogs and the Brisbane Broncos at ANZ Stadium in Sydney, Australia
